attributes.action: have a fairer election system, which does not force people to choose the lesser of 2 evils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The election system in this Country means that if you dont want the Conservatives in, you have to vote Labour, and vice versa.  People who support smaller political parties are usually forced into voting for other parties just to prevent some even worse scumbags from being elected.  Give the people a voice.  This shouldn't even need a petition.  Introduce a PR-style system were people can put their first, second, third etc. preference.  ITS ONLY FAIR

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
